summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Wet Dry Body Bath Foot Brush - 2 Pack With Massage Nodes & Long Handle - Removes Dead Skin And Toxins - Improve Your Circulation - Natural Bristle Back Scrubber for Exfoliating Skin & Foot Scrub Leg
Review Date: 2020/04/30
Store: Kitchen Krush
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Material': 'Nylon', 'Brand': 'Kitchen Krush', 'Power Source': 'hand_powered', 'Product Benefits': 'Softening,Massage,Relaxation,Smoothening,Clean,Exfoliating,Relaxing,Cleanse,Blood Circulation', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Package Dimensions': '13.94 x 4.88 x 1.57 inches; 11.22 Ounces', 'UPC': '744790296037', 'Manufacturer': 'Kitchen Krush'}
Review Text: With this set I love the handheld scrub brush. It exfoliates well and isn’t too rough. I use it with body wash and while the briststles sort of get pushed down/bent in different directions it still works wonderfully. The long handle back brush though I really don’t like the hard nodule things in the brush. They’re way to hard for me and so I’ve kept it more for a household or outside cleaning brush unfortunately. I really recommend the handheld brush though.
Review Title: Good and bad
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Vitamin C Serum for Face with Hyaluronic Acid & Argireline Peptides by À La Paix - Vitamin E Skin Care Product - Skin Lightening Dark Spot Remover - Anti Aging Face Serum with Red Marine Algae
Review Date: 2020/04/30
Store: à la paix
Average Rating: 4.1
Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'All', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Brand': 'à la paix', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Fl Oz'}
Review Text: I like this serum and I have noticed lighting of the dark spots under my eyes but the formula has a weird smell when applying. It goes away once it dries but I’m sensitive to smells with beauty products and it’s just a turn off for me. Other than that I like it.
Review Title: Works but..
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Hyaluronic Acid & Vitamin C Daily Face Moisturizer by À La Paix - Glycolic Acid & Salicylic Acid Anti Aging Face Cream - Moisturizer for Face & Neck Reducing Wrinkles, Fine Lines, Dark Spots,Age Spots
Review Date: 2020/04/30
Store: à la paix
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'À la paix', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Unit Count': '1.7 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Product Dimensions': '1.25 x 1.25 x 6 inches; 3.99 Ounces', 'UPC': '685349909667'}
Review Text: I like this moisturizer and I have noticed lighting of the dark spots under my eyes but the formula has a weird smell when applying. It goes away once it dries but I’m sensitive to smells with beauty products and it’s just a turn off for me. Other than that I like it.
Review Title: Works well but
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Livordo Moroccan Argan Oil Essential Organic Cold Pressed Skin Moisturizer Rich in Vitamin E Powerful Antioxidants For Skin, Hair, Body, and Face 4 Oz
Review Date: 2020/04/30
Store: Livordo
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Livordo', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Unit Count': '4.00 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Type': 'Acne prone,mature', 'Product Dimensions': '1.5 x 1.5 x 5 inches; 9.24 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'Argan Oil', 'UPC': '010725983878'}
Review Text: I love this argon oil for my hair so much. It smells absolutely amazing and I love using it the night before a shower as an over night hair treatment. I’ll wash it out in the morning so that my hair doesn’t look oily or greasy. It for sure has helped nourish my hair and make it look and feel more healthy.
Review Title: Smells SO good!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: ARTPE M.N.P Eye Cream 20ml - Reducing Wrinkles Increasing Elasticity Improving Skin Moisture 3 in 1 Intense Eye Care Treatment Cream, Dark Circle Puffiness, Moisturizing, Eye Filler Care
Review Date: 2020/04/30
Store: ARTPE
Average Rating: 3.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'ARTPE', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Eyes', 'Skin Type': 'Mature', 'Package Dimensions': '6.5 x 1.26 x 0.94 inches; 1.13 Ounces'}
Review Text: I got this to help with the darkness under my eyes. I’ve used it four times now and I’ve noticed a little bit of a difference. With a prolonged use I hope it’ll clear the dark circles up entirely. It’s easy to apply and I love that it has hyaluronic acid in it as that’s really good for moisturization.
Review Title: Lovely
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on this purchase history, analyze and summarize this person's genuine preferences and patterns in under 256 words. Think step by step:

    1. First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments
    2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases
    3. Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns
    4. Finally, synthesize these observations into core preferences

    Remember to:
    - Focus only on keywords and  trends supported by multiple interactions
    - Avoid repeating specific product names or details
    - Base conclusions strictly on the provided purchase data

    Here's the purchase data:

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The individual displays a consistent preference for skincare products that focus on exfoliation, moisturizing, and anti-aging benefits. Sentiments indicate a mix of satisfaction and disappointment, often hinging on product scent and application texture. The reviews suggest a strong preference for gentle formulations, as evidenced by their positive feedback on soft, non-irritating brushes and oils. 

There's a notable sensitivity to smells, with multiple mentions of unpleasant or overpowering scents detracting from the user experience, although they appreciate effective results from the products. Overall ratings hover around average to slightly above, indicating a critical eye towards quality.

In terms of usage, products are aimed at enhancing skin appearance and health, particularly targeting dark spots, hydration, and overall skin vitality. Sensitivities are pronounced in the choice of skincare, with a clear inclination towards natural and soothing ingredients.

Quality over quantity is preferred, as the individual favors products that yield visible results without adverse effects, suggesting they may be less price-sensitive if the performance justifies the cost. The individual appears to value functionality alongside sensory experiences, preferring products that deliver on promised benefits while being considerate of their sensory needs.

target_interaction.title: Yuck!
target_interaction.text: These things should not be used! We used them and after only a week there was green or something forming on the inside of the clips and whatever is used to help keep the toothbrushes clean/sanitized you can taste on your tooth brush. These are gross and I feel are a safety hazard.
target_interaction.title_meta: Steripod Kids Clip-On Toothbrush Protector Family Pack (8 total protectors)
